page.title: 11Plummers Plain Garage
page.content: Plummers Plain Garage is owned by a Mr. Lockyear but the forecourt is owned by the man who turns the pumps on and looks after the till. He has been working at the garage for 23 years.He has about 300 customers on a normal weekday. Opening hours are 8.00-7.00. The busiest time of day is 6.0-7.0 pm. The manager employs 10 people. The garage became self-service last year and the manager says this pleased everyone. He works about 10 hrs a day. The garage sells about 20 cars a week. The workshop told us that the most common repair is replacing brakepads. They repair about 5 cars a day. They also do MOTs which take about half an hour each. The workshop hours are 8.30-5.30. By Melissa Deth and Sarah Crofts
